resources.string: Hyehyɛ URL no wɔ wo nhyehyɛe mu.TXT
Paw bere a wɔde yɛ foforo
Nsɛm a Wɔabɔ ho Nkɔmhyɛ Kratafa
Sɛ wopɛ a: URL a wɔahyɛ da ayɛ
Kyerɛ akenkan a ɛwɔ dan mu?
Update nkutoo na ɛwɔ WiFi so?
Nkɔmhyɛ URL no Nsiesie, Sesa Settings.txt na sesa
Wɔayɛ saa app yi updated nanso server a woreyɛ connecting no nnyaa inigo plugin no foforo mma Weewx. Ebia fields rentumi nkyerɛ yiye kosi sɛ weewx no bɛba foforo
Yɛsrɛ sɛ twɛn bere a yɛrehwɛ sɛ URL a wode kɔe no yɛ nokware no
Wogye di sɛ wopɛ sɛ wuyi data nyinaa fi hɔ?
Mfomso bi sii bere a na wɔrebɔ mmɔden sɛ wɔbɛma dwuma a wɔde di no ayɛ foforo
Na ontumi nkɔ anaasɛ woantwe amfi custom URL a wɔakyerɛ no mu
Na ontumi mfa webcam mfonini bi nkɔ anaasɛ ɔntwe mfi wo server so
Na ontumi nkɔka anaasɛ ɔntwe nkɔmhyɛ no
Forecast Type \'%1$s\' no nyɛ adwuma, hwɛ wo settings fael no na sɔ hwɛ bio
Na ontumi mfa radar= mfonini mfi Intanɛt so anaasɛ ɔntwe
wantumi ankɔ so ankɔfa data.txt amfi wo server so anaa antwe
Na ontumi mfa nhyehyɛe no nkɔ anaasɛ ɔntwe mfi wo server no so
Wɔde URL no sii hɔ sɛ default anaasɛ na hwee nni mu
Na ontumi nkɔka anaasɛ ɔntwe nkɔmhyɛ no
Nneɛma a Wɔde Yɛ Nneɛma a Wɔahyɛ Da Ayɛ
Radar URL no nyɛ nea wɔde asi hɔ. Wubetumi akɔ nhyehyɛe ahorow mu akɔsesa
Radar mfonini no da so ara retwe
antumi anni nsɛm a wɔahyɛ ho nkɔm ho dwuma ho dwuma
Anka updated nanso wifi connection no nni hɔ
Update interval no nyɛ adwuma, update nhyehyɛe na afei san sɔ hwɛ
a worebɔ mmɔden sɛ wobɛtwe data.txt afi wo server so
Radar type \'%1$s\' nyɛ adwuma, hwɛ wo settings fael no na sɔ hwɛ bio
Webcam mfonini no da so ara retwe
Webcam URL no nyɛ nea wɔahyehyɛ anaasɛ ɛnyɛ hwee
Set to manual updates, nanso content cache biara nni hɔ de besi nnɛ
Da so ara retwe nkɔmhyɛ data
Fa update times a ɛyɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ di dwuma
Kɔkɔbɔ: Sɛ wobɛma atifi hɔ nhyehyɛe no atumi ayɛ adwuma a, ebetumi ama wo batere no ayow ntɛmntɛm sen sɛnea ɛtaa yɛ no
Sie App Debug Nsɛm a Wɔakyerɛw
Manual Update Set, Swipe Refresh Screen no na fa wo ho hyɛ mu
Custom URL no nnyɛ set, anaasɛ ɛyɛ blank. Wubetumi akɔ nhyehyɛe mu de URL a wɔahyɛ da ayɛ aka ho
Ɔsram a edi hɔ no mu nsɛm a esisi?
